item.title: 沙特可能增持顶级建筑商股份以支持经济重组
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯政府可能会增持一家陷入困境的建筑企业集团的股份，该集团被视为该国万亿美元经济转型计划的关键。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s government may increase its stake in a struggling construction conglomerate that’s seen as key to the country’s trillion-dollar economic transformation plans.】

item.title: 在欧佩克+产量限制下，俄罗斯石油钻探量从创纪录水平下滑
item.description: 随着欧佩克+（OPEC+）减产协议的深化，俄罗斯石油公司的钻井速度较去年创下的纪录有所下降。【原文：Russia’s oil firms have reduced pace of drilling from last year’s record as the nation deepened its OPEC+ production cuts.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑将迎来四月以来最差一周
item.description: 一英镑硬币。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：One pound sterling coins. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: Erste 集团股息创历史新高，利息收入目标上调
item.description: Erste 集团银行股份公司（Erste Group Bank AG）计划在今年的业绩报告中支付创纪录的股息，并在新任首席执行官的首份财报中上调了利息收入展望。【原文：Erste Group Bank AG plans to pay a record dividend on this year’s results and raised its outlook for interest income in the first earnings report overseen by its new chief executive officer.】

item.title: 民调机构 SWS 称马科斯民望从低点反弹
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯的信任度从上任以来的最低水平回升，但在前领导人罗德里戈-杜特尔特的大本营--南部棉兰老岛，他的信任度仍然很低。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr.’s trust rating rebounded from the lowest level since he assumed office, but remained weak in the southern Mindanao island, former leader Rodrigo Duterte’s stronghold.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

 

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

 

】

item.title: 市场现在担心美联储的等待游戏太长
item.description:
一天的变化真大。在因预期 9 月降息而上涨之后，一系列数据指向经济衰退，股票遭到抛售。【原文：

What a difference a day makes. After rising on expectations of a September rate cut, stocks sell off after a slew of data points to recession.

】

item.title: 新加坡将成立审查小组提振低迷股市
item.description: 在要求采取措施解决流动性不足问题的呼声日益高涨之际，新加坡成立了一个振兴股市的审查小组。【原文：Singapore has established a review group to revive its stock market amid growing calls for initiatives to tackle poor liquidity.】

item.title: 日本银行股在加息后创下自大流行病以来最糟糕的一天
item.description: 由于投资者在日本央行加息后纷纷获利了结，推动日本股市反弹的银行股遭遇了 2020 年 3 月以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Banking stocks, which have been driving the rally in Japanese equities, suffered the biggest drop since March 2020, as investors moved to take profit following the Bank of Japan’s rate hike.】

item.title: 沙特基金数十亿美元银行交易深化中国支点
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯财富基金与六家中国金融机构签署了价值高达 500 亿美元的初步协议，这是沙特阿拉伯王国与北京关系不断深化的最新例证。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s wealth fund signed preliminary agreements worth as much as $50 billion with six Chinese financial institutions, in the latest example of the kingdom’s deepening ties with Beijing.】

item.title: 软银暴跌让孙正义身家缩水 25 亿美元
item.description: 软银集团股份有限公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）的股价连续两天全军覆没，使其创始人孙正义的身家减少了 25 亿美元，这位科技投资者受到了日本央行早于预期加息的冲击。【原文：A two-day wipeout in shares of SoftBank Group Corp. has cut $2.5 billion off the fortune of its founder Masayoshi Son, as the tech investor is buffeted by the Bank of Japan’s earlier-than-expected interest-rate hike.】

item.title: 马来西亚前景光明，林吉特创 14 年最佳表现
item.description: 由于对马来西亚经济和外国资金流入持乐观态度，林吉特将迎来 14 年来最长的连涨期。【原文：The ringgit is set for its longest winning streak in 14 years on optimism surrounding Malaysia’s economy and foreign fund inflows.】

item.title: 中国钢材价格跌至 2017 年水平，低迷加剧
item.description: 中国建筑业使用的一种主要钢材价格即将创下七年多来的最低水平，这凸显出长期低迷的经济形势令世界其他地区的建筑业感到恐慌。【原文：The price of a key Chinese steel product used in construction is on the cusp of hitting its lowest level in more than seven years, underscoring the protracted downturn that’s spooking the industry in the rest of the world.】

item.title: 掉期市场尚未考虑经济学家预测的日本央行加息
item.description: 利率掉期市场尚未对经济学家预期的日本央行今年的加息步伐和规模进行定价。【原文：The interest-rate swap market is yet to price in the pace and size of rate hikes that economists expect from the Bank of Japan this year.】

item.title: 台湾称澳门的 "一个中国 "要求阻碍了特使的签证申请
item.description: 台湾方面表示，由于澳门特别行政区政府要求员工签署 "一个中国原则 "的承诺书才能获得签证，因此台湾很难向澳门代表处派遣员工。【原文：Taiwan said it’s having difficulty sending staff to its representative office in Macau because the special administrative region’s government is demanding that they sign a commitment to the “One China Principle” to get a visa.】

item.title: 印度卢比成为本季度表现第二差的亚洲货币
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 摩根大通将监控投资者受限后的印度债券流动性
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. will more closely monitor liquidity in longer tenor Indian debt that is part of its emerging market bond index, after moves by authorities to remove eligibility from future issuances of the bonds.】

item.title: 日本股市跌势加深，亚洲股市创 2022 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 在日本股市大跌、全球科技股下跌和美国经济疲软的三重打击下，亚洲股市暴跌。【原文：Asian stocks tumbled as sentiment was hit by a triple whammy of a Japan selloff, a global tech rout and weakness in the US economy.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求低迷，中国汽车制造商 7 月销量喜忧参半
item.description: 7 月份，电动汽车的需求疲软对中国汽车制造商造成了影响，其中几家公司的业绩出现了大幅下滑。【原文：Softening demand for electric vehicles weighed on China’s automakers in July, with several posting steep month-on-month declines.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特连续第 12 个交易日抛售美国银行股票
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）连续第 12 天抛售美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Warren Buffett sold shares of Bank of America Corp. for the 12th straight day, trimming his conglomerate’s massive stake in the lender by a total of 8.8% — or $3.8 billion — since mid-July.】

item.title: 软银和东京电子的盈利可能因人工智能芯片需求而增长
item.description: 东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）和 Lasertec 公司将紧随芯片巨头 SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc）和三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. and Lasertec Corp. will report earnings on the heels of chip titans SK Hynix Inc. and Samsung Electronics Co., which benefited from robust demand for high-bandwidth memory chips used in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 三星抢占人工智能风口，亚洲芯片股领导地位发生变化
item.description: 在寻找下一个人工智能行业佼佼者的过程中，外国投资者的买盘推动了三星电子公司股价的上涨，亚洲芯片股领导者的地位正在发生变化。【原文：A change is afoot in Asian chip stock leadership, as buying by foreign investors drives gains in shares of Samsung Electronics Co. amid a search for the next top performers in the artificial intelligence trade.】

item.title: 非农就业前两年期国债收益率降至 14 个月低点
item.description: 对政策敏感的两年期国债收益率跌至 2023 年 5 月以来的最低水平，因为交易员们都在关注即将公布的就业数据，以寻找有关美国降息幅度的线索。【原文：The policy-sensitive two-year Treasury yields dropped to the lowest level since May 2023 as traders fixated on upcoming jobs data for clues on the magnitude of US interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 日本零售交易商削减对墨西哥比索的看涨押注
item.description: 日本个人投资者将墨西哥比索兑日元的看涨押注降至今年最低，这表明国内加息可能会降低他们对国外高收益资产的偏好。【原文：Japanese individual investors cut bullish bets on the Mexico peso against the yen to the lowest this year, in a sign of how interest-rate hikes at home may reduce their appetite for higher-yielding assets abroad.】

item.title: 绝对能源公司任命新首席执行官，将争取更多时间偿还债务
item.description: 因欺诈调查而身价暴跌的泰国可再生能源公司 Energy Absolute Pcl 任命了新的首席执行官，并表示计划与债券持有人举行会议，以争取更多时间偿还债务。【原文：Energy Absolute Pcl, the Thai renewable energy company that has slumped in value amid a fraud probe, named a new chief executive officer and said it plans meetings with bondholders to seek more time to pay debt.】

item.title: 日本股市跌势加剧，Topix 指数面临调整
item.description: 由于日元走强和对美国经济健康状况的担忧打击了投资者的情绪，日本股市暴跌，基准的 Topix 指数从 7 月份的高点下跌了 10%以上。【原文：Japanese shares tumbled, with the benchmark Topix index falling more than 10% from its July peak, as a stronger yen and concern over the health of the US economy dealt a blow to investor sentiment.】

item.title: 需求困境抵消中东风险，石油将出现单周下跌
item.description: 由于世界两大经济体的需求担忧盖过了地缘政治风险加剧的影响，石油连续第四个星期下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a fourth weekly drop as demand concerns in the world’s two biggest economies overshadowed heightened geopolitical risk.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市在就业数据公布前下挫。科技股收益继续令人失望。日本央行观察家重新评估加息步伐。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks sink ahead of jobs data. Tech earnings continue to disappoint. BOJ watchers reassess the pace of rate hikes. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国债券交易员在对中国人民银行的担忧中寻求避风港湾
item.description: 中国的债券交易商们正在市场的一个小角落里寻求庇护，以利用对进一步降息的押注，因为在创纪录的涨势中，官方反击的威胁降低了。【原文：China’s bond traders are seeking shelter in a little played corner of the market to take advantage of bets on further interest-rate cuts that come with a lower threat of official pushback at a record rally.】

item.title: 华侨银行因财富和交易收益而实现超预期利润
item.description: 华侨银行第二季度利润超出预期，原因是交易和财富管理费用大幅增长，帮助支撑了不温不火的贷款收入。【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.’s second-quarter profit beat expectations, as a strong haul in trading and wealth fees helped to bolster tepid lending income.】
